traits.name: Tail Spike Regrowth
entries: The manticore has twenty-four tail spikes. Used spikes regrow when the manticore finishes a long rest.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The manticore makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws or three with its tail spikes.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail Spike
entries: Ranged atk +5 to hit, range 100/200 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3 damage) piercing damage.
